title: Charlotte Church Thanks Her Dad for Helping Her Stay Safe
summary: Charlotte Church is a famous singer who became a star when she was just 11 years old. She says she would not be alive today without her dad's help. Growing up as a child star was very hard, with many temptations that could have led to bad choices like addiction. Her dad, James Church, traveled with her and her mom to take care of her while her mom handled the business. He helped her stay grounded and enjoy her fame while it lasted. Now, her dad is very sick with a rare blood disorder and has been in the hospital many times. Charlotte is making a photo album to show how much he means to her and how he shaped her life. She credits him for being a nurturing and wise person who kept her safe during her childhood.
